recipe.title: Blue Cheese Dip
ingredients: 1/2 pound smoked (or regular) blue cheese, crumbled
Assorted fresh vegetables for dipping (such as baby carrots, green beans, and endive leaves)
instructions: Sprinkle salt over garlic and chop, occasionally smearing mixture with blade of knife, until paste forms. Whisk garlic paste, vinegar, and thyme in a medium bowl. Add cheese; mash with the back of a fork until cheese is finely crumbled. Stir in sour cream and mayonnaise. Season dip to taste with salt and pepper. Serve with assorted vegetables. DO AHEAD: Can be made 2 days ahead. Cover and chill.
